prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon that resembles a cute dessert with a smiling face and snowy accents.
Imagine a small Pokemon with a frosty appearance and playful demeanor, perfect for winter-themed adventures.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a charming ice cream cone, complete with a swirl of snow on top.
Generate a whimsical ice-type creature with a round body and icy features, found in snowy environments.
Design a friendly Pokemon that embodies the spirit of winter with a cheerful face and icy blue colors.
Give me a Pokemon that is playful and covered in snow, with a shape reminiscent of a dessert treat.
Make a Pokemon that captures the essence of frost and fun, ideal for battling in icy terrains.

distinctive_features: Swirl on top resembling ice cream
